## Install {{< fa brands r-project >}}

*iSEE* requires Bioconductor 3.7+ which in turn requires R 3.5+.
Choose a version of R that matches your computerâ€™s operating system.
We recommend using the latest version of R and Bioconductor to access the latest version of *iSEE*.

[Download and install R](https://cran.rstudio.com/)

## Install iSEE

We recommend installing *iSEE* from the Bioconductor repository.
The Bioconductor installation process will install the appropriate version of *iSEE* for your version of R.

[Install iSEE from Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org/packages/iSEE/)

## Install the iSEE-verse

Install all known *iSEE* extensions packages with

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install(c(
    "iSEEde",
    "iSEEhex",
    "iSEEhub",
    "iSEEindex",
    "iSEEpathways",
    "iSEEtree",
    "iSEEu"
))
```
